overall.description: Return the sum along diagonals of the array.

a.description: Input array, from which the diagonals are taken.

offset.description: Offset of the diagonal from the main diagonal. Can be both positive and negative. Defaults to 0.

axis1, axis2.description: Axes to be used as the first and second axis of the 2-D sub-arrays from which the diagonals should be taken. Defaults are the first two axes of a.

dtype.description: Determines the data-type of the returned array and of the accumulator where the elements are summed. If dtype has the value None and a is of integer type of precision less than the default integer precision, then the default integer precision is used. Otherwise, the precision is the same as that of a.

out.description: Array into which the output is placed. Its type is preserved and it must be of the right shape to hold the output.

sum_along_diagonals.description: If a is 2-D, the sum along the diagonal is returned.  If a has larger dimensions, then an array of sums along diagonals is returned.

note: If a has more than two dimensions, then the axes specified by axis1 and axis2 are used to determine the 2-D sub-arrays whose traces are returned. The shape of the resulting array is the same as that of a with axis1 and axis2 removed. '
